::Havoc/Repressor::

Havoc munches on the popcorn, reaching into a compartment and pulling 
out three Coka-Cola bottles. He tosses one to each of his troops, 
taking the third for himself.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Repressor walks over, opening the soda bottle and beginning to drink 
it while also taking a handful of popcorn.

(LOL. I think that's enough on the popcorn now)


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Demolition::
> 
> He laughs as Havoc pulls out pop corn. He takes a hand ful.
> "Ok, we're all set. This should be interesting."
